testcase.classname: To validate new user Sign up functionality for Elearning application
testcase.name: New user Sign in validation
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Registration Page..........................................passed And User Enters firstname "Tom".............................................passed And User Enters lastname "Koris"............................................passed And User Enters email "tk@gmail.com"........................................passed And User Enters username "Tom_Koris"........................................passed And User Enters password "Welcome%".........................................passed And Usre Enters confirmpwd "Welcome%".......................................passed When User clicks on Register button.........................................passed Then User should see his name "Tom Koris"...................................passed And User clicks on Compose..................................................passed And User enters recipient "abc".............................................passed And User enters subject "Test email 1"......................................passed And User enters message.....................................................passed When User Clicks Send button................................................passed Then User should see success "The message has been sent to".................passed When Uer Clicks on Logout...................................................passed Then User should be logged out..............................................passed

testcase.classname: To validate new user Sign up functionality for Elearning application
testcase.name: New user Sign in validation 2
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Registration Page..........................................passed And User Enters firstname "Sars"............................................passed And User Enters lastname "Fossil"...........................................passed And User Enters email "sf@yahoo.com"........................................passed And User Enters username "Sars_Fossil"......................................passed And User Enters password "Welcome@".........................................passed And Usre Enters confirmpwd "Welcome@".......................................passed When User clicks on Register button.........................................passed Then User should see his name "Sars Fossil".................................passed And User clicks on Compose..................................................passed And User enters recipient "def".............................................passed And User enters subject "Test email 2"......................................passed And User enters message.....................................................passed When User Clicks Send button................................................passed Then User should see success "The message has been sent to".................passed When Uer Clicks on Logout...................................................passed Then User should be logged out..............................................passed

testcase.classname: To validate new user Sign up functionality for Elearning application
testcase.name: New user Sign in validation 3
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Registration Page..........................................passed And User Enters firstname "Stepen"..........................................passed And User Enters lastname "Raul".............................................passed And User Enters email "sr@redif.com"........................................passed And User Enters username "Stepen_Raul"......................................passed And User Enters password "Welcome$".........................................passed And Usre Enters confirmpwd "Welcome$".......................................passed When User clicks on Register button.........................................passed Then User should see his name "Stepen Raul".................................passed And User clicks on Compose..................................................passed And User enters recipient "ghi".............................................passed And User enters subject "Test email 3"......................................passed And User enters message.....................................................passed When User Clicks Send button................................................passed Then User should see success "The message has been sent to".................passed When Uer Clicks on Logout...................................................passed Then User should be logged out..............................................passed
